Let's suppose that we have two ropes and each takes `one hour to burn but not uniformly.` How can we `measure 45 minutes` ?

After a half-hour, so at $t=30 \text{min}$, the second rope has entirely burned and the first one has a remaining of 30 minutes. At this time, we burn the second end of the first rope.
